ygData.subject: Re: Rune I, Jade, and Brilliance
ygData.msgSnippet: 1. Rune I is a great spell, its a lot like divine aura (cleric).  More or less it grants invunerability for a short time which I m sure you can imagine is
ygData.messageBody:
1. Rune I is a great spell, its a lot like divine aura (cleric). More or
less it grants invunerability for a short time which I'm sure you can
imagine is quite handy. A good spell to have!

2. Jade is also available in Akanon, at the jeweler immediately beside the
bankers, as are all other stones except perhaps black pearls or wolfs eye
agate. The metals are available in the room nearest the bank.

3. I have recently aquired a level 44 spell : Brilliance and want to know
what it does. This sounds a lot like the 'enchantment of brilliance' spell
which was supposedly removed from the game. Has anyone USED this spell?
If I get a good offer I may sell it, it is quite a ways from where I am
(lvl wise) and I can probably get it again. You can /tell me on Rallos Zek
if you are interested.

Cogg - Rallos Zek
